item.name: Update the profile picture of a logged-in user or a specified user/client.

formdata.description: The ID of the user or client whose profile picture is being updated. Required if `type` is provided.
The type of the entity whose profile picture is being updated. Must be either 'user' or 'client'.

request.description:
This endpoint allows the authenticated user to update their profile picture.
If both `id` and `type` are provided, the profile picture for the specified user or client will be updated.
If not, the profile picture of the logged-in user will be updated.

Optional. The sort order for the `dob` column. Acceptable values are `ASC` or `DESC`. Default is `ASC`.
Optional. The number of days from today to consider for upcoming birthdays. Default is 30.
Optional. The specific user IDs to filter the results.
Optional. The specific user IDs to filter the results.
Optional. The number of results to return per page. Default is 15.
Optional. The number of results to skip before starting to collect the result set. Default is 0.
